snippet: The Federal Reserve said Wednesday that consumer borrowing rose by $16 billion in August, pushing the total to a fresh record of $3.47 trillion.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve said Wednesday that consumer borrowing rose by $16 billion in August, pushing the total to a fresh record of $3.47 trillion.

headline.print_headline: Consumer Borrowing Hits a Record, Fed Says
headline.main: Consumer Borrowing Hits a Record, Fed Says
